title: Blood-Testing Startups Thrive Despite Theranos Implosion
sub_head: But the scandal has made investors more circumspect in evaluating the science behind new products
body:
Blood-testing startups are thriving, undeterred by any fallout from the collapse of Theranos Inc., a startup that once sought to revolutionize the industry.
A federal jury on Monday convicted Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes on charges that she conducted a yearslong fraud scheme against investors. Ms. Holmes testified at trial that she never intended to mislead anyone, and is likely to appeal.
